event.title: 1822, a group of Austin's colonists went

data.event: In 1822, a group of Austin's colonists went up the Brazos River, stopping near present day Richmond where they built a fort called Fort Bend.

event.title: Named after Richmond, England, the town was among the 19 cities first incorporated by the short-lived Republic of Texas, in 1837

data.event: Named after Richmond, England, the town was among the 19 cities first incorporated by the short-lived Republic of Texas, in 1837.
The Mayor from 1949 until his death in 2012 was Hilmar Moore.
